{{Infobox dungeon |name = Grotte Électrolithe |image = [[File:Chargestone Cave.png|300px]] |caption = Une carte de la Grotte Électrolithe. |tokens = 186 500 |location = Unys - Route 6 }} La '''Grotte Électrolithe''' est un [[Dungeons/fr|donjon]] d'[[Unova/fr|Unys]]. Il a initialement 81 cases arrangées en 9x9, comprenant 9 coffres, 21 rencontres hors boss et 1 Combat de Boss. Les rencontres sauvages ont 3 403 000 PV. ==Tables des rencontres== ===Rencontres sauvages=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon sauvages!! colspan=2|Dresseurs |- ! Rencontres !! Dresseur !! Équipe Pokémon |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Nosepass.png|40px]] Tarinor || [[File:Guitarist.png|40px]] Guitariste Anna || [[File:Emolga.png|40px]] Emolga |- | [[File:Scientist_(male).png|40px]] Scientifique Ronald || [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magnéton |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Boldore.png|40px]] Géolithe|| [[File:Ace_Trainer_(male).png|40px]]Topdresseur Corky || [[File:Klink.png|40px]] Tic, [[File:Unfezant.png|40px]] Déflaisan, [[File:Sandslash.png|40px]] Sablaireau |- | [[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(male).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Louis || [[File:Ampharos.png|40px]] Pharamp |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Joltik.png|40px]] Statitik|| [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Montagnard Otto || [[File:Aron.png|40px]] Galekid,[[File:Nosepass.png|40px]] Tarinor |- | [[File:Pokémon_Ranger_(female).png|40px]] Pokémon Ranger Briana || [[File:Minccino.png|40px]] Chinchidou, [[File:Excadrill.png|30px]] Minotaupe |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Ferroseed.png|40px]] Grindur|| [[File:Doctor.png|30px]] Infirmier Kit || [[File:Solosis.png|40px]] Nucléos,[[File:Gothita.png|40px]] Scrutella |- | [[File:Scientist_(female).png|40px]] Scientifique Lumi || [[File:Joltik.png|40px]] Statitik, [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Nosferalto |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Klink.png|40px]] Tic|| [[File:Guitarist.png|40px]] Guitariste Beverly || [[File:Zebstrika.png|40px]] Zéblitz |- | [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Montagnard Jeremy || [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix, [[File:Boldore.png|40px]] Géolithe |- | [[File:Ace_Trainer_(female).png|40px]] Topdresseuse Vicki || [[File:Stoutland.png|40px]] Mastouffe, [[File:Krokorok.png|40px]] Escroco, [[File:Ferroseed.png|40px]] Grindur |} ===Combat de Boss=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
